columns.name: file_no
columns.description: Unique identifier for the legal matter, formatted as 'MAT-' followed by a numeric identifier

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client associated with the matter, formatted as 'CL-' followed by a numeric identifier

columns.name: matterSummary
columns.description: Brief summary or description of the legal matter, including parties involved and a brief description of the case
columns.example: Healthcare Solutions Inc v. ACME Corp - Employment Dispute

columns.name: area
columns.description: Area of law or practice related to the matter (e.g., Tax, Environmental, Litigation)

columns.name: startDate
columns.description: Date when the matter started, with varying formats (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY, DD/MM/YY, DD-MMM-YYYY)

columns.name: owner
columns.description: Name of the person responsible for or assigned to the matter
